name: Golden Hour - Team Vibes 'R' Us
description:
Walk around the beautiful scenery in Saint-Marcellin France, take pictures and enjoy a cheese sandwich.

Controls:

use wasd keys and mouse to move

use e to switch to first person to take pictures

use space bar to take pictures

use b to go to the main menu 

press q to eat a sandwich

Made by Team Vibes 'R' Us:

Aurora Freir 

Oliver Addison 

Rhianne Macswan 

Vaughan Lee-Spring 

Dayna McEntee 

Ella Dear 

Alvaro Castro-Mendivil

Known Bugs:

Menu buttons do not work.

Holding down e causes the camera to stop working.

Album doesn't display photos taken.

Players position is reset every time the game is exited.

Missing colliders on objects.

Animations loop after camera is closed until player moves.
